description:
## Summary:

The keyboard doesn't slide back down after clicking on the save option after editing in the text field in Edit Profile fragment

## Steps to reproduce:

Go to Profile Activity
Click on Edit text in any field, edit something
Click on save button

## Expected behaviour:

Keyboard should slide down

## Observed behaviour:

The keyboard is not sliding down

## Device and Android version:

Realme 2 Pro
Android version 8.1.0
name: Mobile Wallet: Bug Fix - Keyboard not sliding down after saving
